analysis.summary: The hello-app-jt2rb experiment completed successfully after 757.8 seconds (12m38s) with a cost of $0.0042. The validation workflow succeeded, but both CPU and memory metrics failed to collect due to victoria-metrics-server DNS resolution failures in the observability namespace. No performance data is available to assess the app target's resource utilization.

metricInsights.cpu_usage: Metric collection failed due to DNS lookup error for victoria-metrics-server.observability.svc, preventing any CPU usage analysis of the containerized workloads.
metricInsights.memory_usage: Metric collection failed due to DNS lookup error for victoria-metrics-server.observability.svc, preventing any memory working set measurement for the experiment containers.

recommendations: Verify that victoria-metrics-server is deployed in the observability namespace and the service DNS is correctly configured
Check CoreDNS functionality and network policies that may be blocking DNS resolution from the metrics collection pod
Consider implementing a pre-flight check to validate observability stack availability before running experiments
